posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping - Paypal gift, check or money order.  For multiple purchases of raw cards, $2 discount for each additional card.  For multiple purchases of insured cards, contact for discounts (depends on the card).

Additional cards, including T205s (SGC, PSA and ungraded) can be found by left-clicking on my website links below.  Adding prices and scans continuously - another 100 raw T205's and T206's during the football games today (go Falcons, go Broncos).

Please contact using my email: T206TheMonster at gmail.com 

Left-click on icon or hot-link to see full-size card image.  Prices on some are discounted here (lower than VCP average)

Also, due to non-paying ebayer, have available again: Conroy, Pelty, Rucker throwing (all SGC 50) - 1st row of T206 sale page

Bump...

Plenty of cards left, make offers.

Adding T205's to my website continuously - images for about 20 are up now, prices and 150 more cards to be added through this weekend, SGC, PSA and non-graded, with plenty of HOF'ers.

Please send all questions to T206TheMonster at gmail.com

Please bear with me on this.  I'm putting items up on the website QUICKLY - I have already had a few obvious errors pointed out to me, and I appreciate it.

If you find a card with what's obviously a screwed-up price, I'm obviously going to tell you as much - I'm not trying to do a 'bait and switch'.

bump.  I'll start loading these into the ebay store this weekend, so let's consummate any deals we have in progress.
Sale is over.  Thanks for all of you who are passing your business my way - I'll have more cards soon - if you change your mind about any of these, they will all be on ebay over the next week.

1/2 of the raw T206s (up to Keeler, alphabetically) are still available on the website.  Through Keeler have been moved to ebay and are not available at the reduced website prices once a bid is placed.  Slabbed cards have all been moved to ebay.

Thanks for everyone's interest and purchases - I hope to have more available very soon.
